meanings.definition: Plural noun: decorative ornaments placed along the eaves of a building
meanings.sent1: The antefixa added a touch of elegance to the old house.
meanings.sent2: The antefixa were carefully crafted and beautifully displayed.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to steal one of the antefixa for its nest.
meanings.sent4: The antefixa stood out against the gray sky like jewels in a treasure chest.
meanings.sent5: Every antefixa told a story of the building's history and style.

meanings.definition: Verb: to adorn with decorative ornaments along the eaves
meanings.sent1: She decided to antefixa the entire house for the festive season.
meanings.sent2: The skilled artisan antefixaed the roof with intricate designs.
meanings.sent3: The children wanted to antefixa their treehouse with colorful ribbons.
meanings.sent4: His words antefixaed the story with vivid imagery and emotion.
meanings.sent5: The music antefixaed the dance performance, making it truly magical.
